content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I’m here to help you schedule an HVAC service appointment. May I have your name, please?
Thanks, Linda! Could you please provide your address so I can check if you are within our service area?
Sure, I live at 1234 Maple Grove Lane, Pleasantville.
Thank you. One moment while I check if we can service that location.
I’m sorry, Linda, but it looks like your address is outside of our service area. We won’t be able to provide HVAC services to that location. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
Actually, I just decided I don’t need the service anymore. Thanks anyway.
Thank you for letting me know, Linda. If you need any home services in the future, feel free to contact us. Have a great day!
reason: Customer changed mind about needing the service
